problem.markdown:
>>As the mass increases, what happens to the time required for 5 cycles of motion?<< (x) the time increases ( ) the time decreases ( ) the time stays the same
[explanation] As you increase the mass of the SDOF system it tends to oscillate at a slower rate. More mass means a slower frequency, or rate of oscillation. [explanation]
problem.p: As the mass increases, what happens to the time required for 5 cycles of motion?

choicegroup.label: As the mass increases, what happens to the time required for 5 cycles of motion?

div.p: As you increase the mass of the SDOF system it tends to oscillate at a slower rate. More mass means a slower frequency, or rate of oscillation.
